tours.bike.meta.title: Bike Tours in Mexico City | CDMX Tours
tours.walking.meta.title: Walking Tours in Mexico City | CDMX Tours
tours.calendar_of_tours.title: Tour Calendar for May
tours.calendar_of_tours.desc: Departures at 9am only with prior reservation. Limited availability
tours.book.title: Book a Tour
tours.have_a_question.desc: If you have any questions about our tours, please do not hesitate to contact us. We have friendly, knowledgeable representatives to assist you. Check out our FAQ page or send us a message! You can contact us at
tours.meet.desc: To ensure a smooth start to your tour, we will meet you at our designated meeting point located at {location}  . Our meeting point is conveniently located and easy to find, so you won't have to worry about getting lost on your way to the start of the tour. When you arrive, you'll be greeted by our friendly and knowledgeable staff who will get you set up with your bike and all the gear you need for a comfortable and safe ride. From there, we'll head out on an adventure together, exploring the city's vibrant neighborhoods, historical landmarks, and hidden gems.
taco.name: Downtown Tacos & History Tour
taco.desc: Come and discover the origins of Mexico City, going from the main streets and squares to the lesser-known corners of the Historic Center. During the tour you will eat a wide variety of tacos, from pastor tacos to sweat basket tacos.
coyo.name: Frida Bike Tour
coyo.desc: Frida Kahlo grew up in the oldest spanish neighborhood of Mexico City, more than 500 years of history involve Coyoácan and San Ángel, come to learn about its stories and events, visit Frida Kahlo and Diego Rivera Studio House and finish the tour with tacos and churros.
coyo.shortDesc: Frida Kahlo grew up in the oldest spanish neighborhood of Mexico City, more than 500 years of history involve Coyoácan and San Ángel, come to learn about its stories and events, visit Frida Kahlo and Diego Rivera Studio House and finish the tour with tacos and churros.
essentials.name: Mexico City Essentials
essentials.desc: Come and ride from  the Aztec Ruins to the hipster neighborhoods, while you eat 3 delicious varieties of tacos and learn about history, society and architecture.
southside.name: Mexico City South Side
southside.desc: Bike throught the spanish 16th century towns (San Angel & Coyoacán) and the modernist campus of the National University. In this tour you will visit this neighborhoods/ places:{br} • San Ángel Town{br} • Frida Kahlo & Diego Rivera Studio{br} • National University Campus{br} • Tacos and Hydratation stop{br} • Coyoacán Town{br} • Frida Kahlo Blue House (outside)
southside.shortDesc: Bike throught the spanish 16th century towns (San Angel & Coyoacán) and the modernist campus of the National University.
arch.name: ARCHITECTURAL BIKE TOUR / ROMA - CONDESA
arch.desc: The Chic neighborhoods of Mexico City have a secret: they were designed by architects. Come and discover the urban and architectural origin of these neighbourhoods. In addition to knowing the emblematic streets and buildings, you will eat in a legendary taqueria in Condesa and you will visit the largest urban park in the country.
arch_walk_downtown.name: Walking Architecture Tour - Downtown Mexico City
arch_walk_downtown.desc: Come and discover the origins of the city by the hand of a local architect that will show you how does Mexico City pass from the captial of the aztec empire to the capital of New Spain and then the capital of Mexico.
arch_walk_reforma.name: Walking Architecture Tour Reforma - Chapultepec
arch_walk_reforma.desc: Reforma the main avenue in Mexico City is surrounded by the best examples of architecture since 1860's. Enjoy and learn about eclectic, art decó, modernism, brutalism, hightech and contemporary architecture. Guided by a local architect.
arch_walk_roma.name: Walking Architecture Tour Roma - Condesa
arch_walk_roma.desc: Reforma the main avenue in Mexico City is surrounded by the best examples of architecture since 1860's. Enjoy and learn about eclectic, art decó, modernism, brutalism, hightech and contemporary architecture. Guided by a local architect.
taco_walking_downtown.name: Walking Taco Tour - Downtown Mexico City
taco_walking_downtown.desc: Come and discover the origins of Mexico City, going from the main streets and squares to the lesser-known corners of the Historic Center. During the tour you will eat a wide variety of tacos, from pastor tacos to sweat basket tacos.
urban.name: Mexico City North Side
urban.desc: The Urban Tour focuses on the urban growth that the city had, from the first neighborhoods of the 19th century to the industrial zones of the 50s in Mexico City.
markets.name: Markets Tour / From jamaica flowers market to san juan gourmet market
markets.desc: Mexico its one of the most famous tourist destinies in terms of gastonomy around the world. Join us to visit the epicenter of food and culture: the markets. During the experience your 5 senses will turn on, due to  the large amount of food, people, products and places you are going to visit.
modernarch.name: Modern Architecture / De San Angel a C.U
modernarch.desc: Explore the story of how the cities of the 20th century were built with concrete, steel and glass. During the tour you will visit the largest university campus in the American continent and also the first modern houses in CDMX, built for Diego Rivera and Frida Kahlo!
galleries.name: Art Galleries / Polanco - San Miguel Chapultepec
galleries.desc: CDMX is the cultural epicenter of Mexico and Latin America, come and take a tour of some of the most important art galleries while you get to know Polanco and the neighborhood with the most art galleries, San Miguel Chapultepec.
tlatelolco.name: Tlatelolco / From the Mexican Market to the City of the Future
tlatelolco.desc: Mexica migration from Aztlán reached Lake Texcoco, founding 2 cities: México-Tenochtitlán and México-Tlatelolco, the latter functioning as the commercial epicenter of Mesoamerica. Come and tour the pre-Hispanic vestiges and the modern city of the future in the Nonoalco Tlatelolco Housing Complex, which houses more than 80,000 inhabitants and has witnessed transcendental historical events.
walkingtaco.name: Taco Tour - WALKING TOUR DOWNTOWN MEXICO CITY
walkingtaco.desc: Come and discover the origins of Mexico City, going from the main streets and squares to the lesser-known corners of the Historic Center. During the tour you will eat a wide variety of tacos, from pastor tacos to sweat basket tacos.
walkingroma.name: Walking Tour - Roma Condesa
walkingroma.desc: The trendy neighborhoods in CDMX have a secret, all of them where designed by architects beforw cars exist. Come and discover why this areas are so comfortable for pedestrians, cyclist and dogs.
